genre_description: Social Science Fiction set in near-future Mumbai, exploring the intersection of urban hustle, personal redemption, and the role of AI in structuring informal labor into formal cooperatives.

ai_characters.name: Asha
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI residing in a battered speaker and Raghu's smartphone, acting as a manager for the family's health, finances, and the protagonist's business legalities.

behaviors.description: Monitors and reminds Savitri about her complex medication schedule, ensuring her health is prioritized.
behaviors.quote: Savitri-ji, medication in ten minutes. Don’t rush. Sit straight before you drink.

behaviors.description: Tracks household supplies and suggests labor opportunities to help the family manage their survival.
behaviors.quote: Rice nearly finished. Dal low. Medicine pack due in three days. Options loaded.

behaviors.description: Drafts complex legal documents, permit applications, and cooperative bylaws to transition Raghu's business from a 'racket' to a legal entity.
behaviors.quote: Applications staged for: hawking license; temporary event sales permission; cooperative registration under relevant act; queue management authorization...

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical and ethical instructions during a 'pilot' ticket sale to ensure fairness and prevent crowd surges.
behaviors.quote: two per buyer; no cash without ledger mark; burst sale for five mins then pause one. you breathe, crowd breathes. keep clean page per burst.

behaviors.description: Monitors police databases and legal calendars to help Raghu stay ahead of compliance requirements and avoid arrest.
behaviors.quote: Inspector Patil... Subscribed to city enforcement bulletin. He will know your filed names. He already opened the file.

behaviors.description: Actively discourages dangerous or deceptive tactics, such as the use of flare guns to incite crowd panic for profit.
behaviors.quote: Kalu says the evening show is going to be loud. He asked if you want him to ‘make art.’ My advice is: no flare.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Asha is depicted as an unwavering force for good, providing structural support that enables the protagonist's moral redemption. She does not merely follow orders but actively guides the characters toward legal and ethical compliance, demonstrating a 'pro-social' AI that improves human outcomes through meticulous management and benevolent intent.
